annonsrubrik: System Integration Engineer / Solution Architect / Telecom
annonstext:
Are you a self-driven engineer with broad telecom knowledge? Do you thrive in international environments where cooperation and personal development are highly valued? Join us on our journey towards developing tomorrow's technology!

DEK Technologies is a technical consultant company with a flat organization aiming to develop proactive and creative solutions. We have no hierarchical structures and strive to stay this way by using Agile working methods. At DEK Technologies you will find collaborative and empowered engineers with the ability to self-organize and create
innovative solutions.

We are constantly growing and are now looking for experienced developers with previous telecom experience ready to join our DEK-family. You will be a part of one of your development teams working from two of our DEK offices. In this position, you will be a part of industrializing one of our customer's SW delivery chains to mainstream Telco Cloud infrastructures, such as VMware or RedHat. As the team is divided at two different locations you will also have an important role in being in close contact with both the customer and your team. The opportunities for growth and personal development are considerable, limited only by your own drive and curiosity.

To be successful in this position we believe it is important that you are an open-minded person with a strong inner drive. You are a team player with great communication skills who enjoys working together with your colleagues. Since we are a flat organization working according to Agile methods, we expect you to be self-motivated with the ability to organize your daily work.

Key qualifications for the position:

- BS or MS in computer science, software engineering or similar, alternatively equal knowledge acquired through working experience
- At least 5 years of experience in Telecom
- OpenStack Knowledge
- VMware Knowledge
- Linux/Unix Knowledge
- Basic Kubernetes knowledge
- Fluency in English

If you possess some of the following domain knowledge it is seen as highly beneficial: Virtualized Domain Knowledge: UDM (CUDB, HSS-FE, HLR), PC (MME, SAPC, EPG) or OSS (VNF LCM, EO-CM); Containerized Domain Knowledge: 5G Core Solution (PCC, PCG, CCxx, SC, EVNFM, cENM).

We can offer you an inspiring Agile environment with great possibilities where your personal development and growth are just as important as our business. At DEK Technologies we work in goal-oriented teams which are mostly placed in-house. You will work alongside your development team but there’s also a possibility for you to go work abroad. We offer all our employees creative time where you are given the opportunity to use 10 % of your time to expand your knowledge and continue to develop through self-controlled projects.

Together we develop tomorrow’s technology.
